column.name: PROC_INST_ID
column.text: 流程实例ID(等于业务主键)

column.name: create_dept_id
column.text: 填制人部门：一般从表单取值，如果没有取发起用户的主部门，主部门没有再取用户的普通部门第一个

column.name: business_status
column.text: 业务自定义的状态,如自定义审批通过、未通过、正常、异常等(内置的状态是1=审批中 2=审批通过 3=审批未通过)

statements.statement:
<#-- 查询已结束的流程实例 --> select RES.*, C.title, C.create_dept_id ,
C.start_user_id , C.start_user_name, C.start_user_org_text, C.start_user_position_text,
C.business_status, C.business_status_desc, C.business_category,
C.sn, C.remark, C.gid, D.version_ version, D.KEY_ process_definition_key from ACT_HI_PROCINST RES left join ext_run_instance C on RES.PROC_INST_ID_ = C.instance_id left join act_re_procdef D on RES.PROC_DEF_ID_=D.ID_ WHERE 1=1 and RES.END_TIME_ is not NULL
<#if query??> <#if query.key??> <#assign key = StringUtil.escapeSql(query.key)/> and ( RES.NAME_ like '%${key}%' or RES.TENANT_ID_ = '%${key}%' or RES.PROC_INST_ID = '%${key}%' or
C.title like '%${key}%' or C.start_user_id = '${key}' or C.start_user_name like '%${key}%' or C.business_key = '%${key}%' or C.business_status_desc like '%${key}%', C.remark like '%${key}%' ) </#if>
<#if query.businessKey??> and RES.BUSINESS_KEY_ = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.businessKey)}' </#if> <#if query.instanceId??> and RES.PROC_INST_ID = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.instanceId)}' </#if>
<#if query.processDefinitionId??> and RES.PROC_DEF_ID_ = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.processDefinitionId)}' </#if> <#if query.processDefinitionName??> and RES.NAME_ = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.processDefinitionName)}' </#if>
<#if query.title??> and C.title = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.title)}' </#if> <#if query.userId??> and C.start_user_id = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.userId)}' </#if> <#if query.startUserName??> and C.start_user_name = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.startUserName)}' </#if> <#if query.business_category??> and C.business_category = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.businessCategory)}' </#if>
<#if query.processDefinitionKey??> and D.KEY_ = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.processDefinitionKey)}' </#if>
<#if query.sortField?? && query.sortOrder??> order by ${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.sortField)} ${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.sortOrder)} <#else> order by RES.END_TIME_ desc </#if>
</#if>
